entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
